TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataService`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Data.Services.IRequestHandler

Docs.typeparam: Type that defines the data service.
Docs.summary: The main entry point for developing an ADO.NET Data Service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601> class does the basic integration of all components of the server system. A new data service that uses system defaults for authorization and caching is created by defining a class that derives from the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601> class and by referencing a compatible data model.
The type of the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601> must expose at least one property that returns an entity set that is an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> collection of entity types. This class must also implement the <xref:System.Data.Services.IUpdatable> interface to enable updates to be made to entity resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new data service that deploys data of the type indicated by the template class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A new data service that uses system defaults for authorization and caching is created by defining a class that derives from the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601> class and by referencing a compatible data model.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AttachHost(class System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost host) cil managed

Docs.summary: Attaches the data service host to the data service identified by the parameter .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> host attached is used by the data service to process requests. There is no requirement to set up a host when the data service is hosted in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance !T CreateDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a data source of the template class that will be used by the data service.
Docs.returns: An instance of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, a constructor without parameters on the type will be used if available.

Docs.summary: Gets the data source instance currently being used to process the request.
Docs.value: The data source instance for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An instance of the template class used when the class was constructed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void HandleException(class System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs args) cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when an exception is raised while processing a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A data service may modify the `args` instance to customize how the exception will be sent in the response.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStartProcessingRequest(class System.Data.Services.ProcessRequestArgs args) cil managed

Docs.param: that contains information about the request.
Docs.summary: Called before processing each request. For batch requests, it is called one time for the top batch request and one time for each operation in the batch.
Gets an object that defines the events for the data service processing pipeline.
Docs.value: A object that is used to define events for the data service processing pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ProcessRequest() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601.AttachHost%2A> method should be invoked before you call <xref:System.Data.Services.DataService%601.ProcessRequest%2A> to get request information and build the response.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message ProcessRequestForMessage(class System.IO.Stream messageBody) cil managed

Docs.param: The body of the HTTP request.
